onset_type.name: onset type
onset_type.description: Onset time origin: SSC; SI - Sudden impulse, ground data; iSW - satellite data

magnitude.name: _magnitude
magnitude.description: FD magnitude as maximum 10 GV CR density variation obtained using GSM corrected for magnetospheric effect using the Dst-index

v_max.name: _V max
v_max.description: Maximum solar wind velocity during the event

v_before.name: _V before
v_before.description: Solar wind velocity 1 hour before onset

bz_abs_max.name: _abs(Bz) max
bz_abs_max.description: Minimum absolute value of IMF Bz-component

time_to_min.name: _time to min
time_to_min.description: Time in hours between the onset and density minimum

gamma.name: gamma
gamma.description: rigidity spectrum exponent during the hour of minimum CR density

kp_max.name: _Kp max
kp_max.description: Maximum Kp index during the event

ap_max.name: _Ap max
ap_max.description: Maximum Ap index during the event

dst_min.name: _Dst min
dst_min.description: Minimum Dst-index value during the event

axy_max.name: _Axy max
axy_max.description: Maximum value of equatorial component of the CR vector anisotropy (%)

phi_axy_max.name: _Phi Axy max
phi_axy_max.description: Direction of the maximum value of equatorial CR anisotropy vector (deg)

ax_max.name: _Ax max
ax_max.description: Maximum value of radial component of the CR vector anisotropy (%)

ay_max.name: _Ay max
ay_max.description: Maximum value of azimuthal component of the CR vector anisotropy (%)

time_to_min_raw.name: _time to min (raw)
time_to_min_raw.description: Time in hours between the onset and density minimum (non corrected)

magnitude_raw.name: _magnitude raw
magnitude_raw.description: FD magnitude as maximum 10 GV CR density variation obtained using GSM

v_mean_x.description: CME average velocity using X-ray flare time

v_mean_c.description: CME average velocity using CME observation time
